com.misfit.misfitsdk.device

类 MFDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.misfit.misfitsdk.device.MFDevice
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior
    直接已知子类:
    MFFlashDevice, MFIwcDevice, MFMKIIDevice, MFRayDevice, MFShine2Device, MFShineDevice, MFSpeedoDevice, MFSwarovskiDevice

    public abstract class MFDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior
    MFDevice reflect to a misfit device, it contains all operations you can do with misfit device. Before you start an operation, please make sure this operation was supported via hasFeature(SupportedFeature)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSerialNumber

        public java.lang.String getSerialNumber()
        Get the serial number of device, it's the unique identifier of the misfit device
        返回:
        the serial number of device

      • getDeviceType

        public int getDeviceType()
        Get device type
        返回:
        device type, refer to MFDeviceType

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Return the device working state. If it's true, please wait until it finish it's work, or you can call stopOperation() to interrupt.
        返回:

        true - busy
        false - not busy

      • stopOperation

        public void stopOperation()
        Stop current operation

      • startSync

        public abstract void startSync(MFSyncParams syncParams,
                               MFOperationResultCallback resultCallback,
                               MFGetCallback<MFDeviceInfo> deviceInfoCallback,
                               MFDataCallback dataCallback,
                               MFOtaCallback otaListener)
        Start to sync data and settings with device, it may include an ota operation
        参数:
        syncParams - basic parameters needed to start sync, refer MFSyncParams
        resultCallback - the callback of sync operation state
        deviceInfoCallback - the callback of get device configuration
        dataCallback - the callback of get sync data
        otaListener - the callback of ota

      • playAnimation

        public void playAnimation(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Send command to play animation
        参数:
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • setGoal

        public void setGoal(int goal,
                    MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Set the daily goal point to device, device will show the progress by some gesture. the value should be displayPoint * 2.5
        参数:
        goal - goal value
        callback -

      • stopAnimation

        public void stopAnimation(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Send command to stop animation
        参数:
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • getDeviceInfo

        public void getDeviceInfo(MFGetCallback<MFDeviceInfo> configurationCallback,
                          MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Send command to get configuration of device
        参数:
        configurationCallback - the callback of configuration result
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • setSingleAlarm

        public void setSingleAlarm(MFAlarmSettings alarm,
                           MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Write single alarm settings to the device, it will override the exist one
        参数:
        alarm - see MFAlarmSettings
        callback - the callback of operation executed state

      • clearAllAlarms

        public void clearAllAlarms(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Clear all alarm settings on device
        参数:
        callback - the callback of operation executed state

      • setInactivityNudge

        public void setInactivityNudge(MFInactivityNudgeSettings settings,
                               MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Write inactivityNudge settings to the device. Device will remind individuals to get regular exercise throughout the day
        参数:
        settings -
        callback -

      • playTextNotification

        public void playTextNotification(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Send command to play phone text notification
        参数:

      • playCallNotification

        public void playCallNotification(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Send command to play phone call notification
        参数:
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • connectHid

        public void connectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback connectionCallback,
                       MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Connect the device with HID profile, Once you are in HID connection, the device will be able to send mapped event to user's phone.
        参数:
        connectionCallback - the HID connection callback which need to register
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • disconnectHid

        public void disconnectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback connectionCallback)
        Disconnect HID connection
        参数:
        connectionCallback - the HID connection callback which need to unregister

      • mapEvent

        public void mapEvent(MFGesture userInput,
                     MFEvent event,
                     MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        已过时。 Please use mapButton(MFGesture, MFEvent, MFOperationResultCallback) instead
        Mapping user's input with some event, if the specified input occurs, the correspond event will be send to user's phone via HID connection, see also:
        connectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback, MFOperationResultCallback)

        disconnectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback)
        参数:
        userInput - user's input
        event - the mapped event
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • unmapAll

        public void unmapAll(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Remove all mappings on device, including button events and activity tagging event

        It's mutually exclusive with mapActivityTagging(MFOperationResultCallback) and mapButton(MFGesture, MFEvent, MFOperationResultCallback)

        参数:
        callback - the callback of command executed state

      • mapActivityTagging

        public void mapActivityTagging(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Mapping user's tagging gesture with activity tagging event. For example for Shine2, once user do a triple tap, it will start activity tagging, then triple tap again, it will stop activity tagging.

        It's mutually exclusive with mapButton(MFGesture, MFEvent, MFOperationResultCallback) and unmapAll(MFOperationResultCallback)

        参数:
        callback -

      • mapButton

        public void mapButton(MFGesture gesture,
                      MFEvent event,
                      MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Mapping user's specified gesture with some event, if this gesture occurs, the correspond event will be send to user's phone via HID connection, see also:
        connectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback, MFOperationResultCallback)

        disconnectHid(MFHIdConnectionCallback)

        It's mutually exclusive with mapButton(MFGesture, MFEvent, MFOperationResultCallback) and unmapAll(MFOperationResultCallback)

        参数:
        gesture - user's specified gesture, its value depends on the getDeviceType(), for example a MFDeviceType.SHINE2 only can use MFGesture.SHINE2_TRIPLE_TAP
        event -
        callback -

      • getMappingType

        public void getMappingType(MFGetCallback<MFMappingType> dataCallback,
                           MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Get device's current mapping type, see also MFMappingType
        参数:
        dataCallback -
        callback -

      • setClockMode

        public void setClockMode(MFClockMode clockMode,
                         MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Set the way of showing clock on the device
        参数:
        clockMode -
        callback -

      • startListenGesture

        public void startListenGesture(MFGestureCallback gestureCallback,
                               MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Start listen to user's gesture e.g single press and double press etc, which can be used for custom link mapping feature.



        note: As the listen channel keeps open once being started, it must be close explicit (refer to stopListenGesture(MFOperationResultCallback) ()}), otherwise no other commands can be executed.

        参数:
        gestureCallback - callback of monitoring streaming event, refer to MFGestureCallback

      • stopListenGesture

        public void stopListenGesture(MFOperationResultCallback callback)
        Stop listen gesture. As the channel keeps open once being started, it must be stop explicit, otherwise no other commands can be executed.
        参数:
        callback - callback of operation success or failed

      • hasFeature

        public boolean hasFeature(SupportedFeature feature)
        Judge whether device support feature
        指定者:
        hasFeature 在接口中 com.misfit.misfitsdk.DeviceBehavior
        参数:
        feature - the feature to be judged
        返回:

        true - current device support this feature

        false - current device doesn't support this feature
